assassin.descHero: Assassins are masters of quick and lethal damage. They excel at eliminating fragile targets, but their low resistance makes them vulnerable to direct attacks.
assassin.descAdvantage: Eliminates Mages quickly, effective against Warriors.
assassin.descWeakness: Vulnerable to Tanks due to low physical resistance.

mage.descHero: Mages unleash powerful spells, wreaking havoc on groups of enemies. Their low physical resistance makes them easy targets for direct attacks.
mage.descAdvantage: Effective against Tanks due to lower magic resistance.
mage.descWeakness: Susceptible to quick attacks from Assassins.

tank.descHero: Tanks are robust and difficult to bring down. They absorb damage to protect their allies, but their damage is moderate.
tank.descWeakness: Intense magic damage from Mages can be problematic.

warrior.descHero: Warriors have a solid balance between damage and resistance. They are versatile, capable of handling different situations.
warrior.descAdvantage: Effective against Assassins and can resist Mages.
warrior.descWeakness: Can be overcome by Tanks due to lower resistance and health.

orc.descHero: Orcs are brutal and resilient warriors. They have a balanced mix of physical and magical damage, making them versatile in combat.
orc.descAdvantage: Strong against Warriors and Mages due to balanced physical and magic resistance.
orc.descWeakness: Vulnerable to quick attacks from Assassins.
